name: mandelbrot
description: Mandelbrot in JS and WASM + Parallelization

scripts.build:wasm: cross-env RUSTFLAGS="-C target-feature=+atomics,+bulk-memory,+mutable-globals" rustup run nightly-2022-12-12 wasm-pack build --target web --out-dir pkg -- . -Z build-std=panic_abort,std
scripts.build: npm run build:wasm && webpack build ./index.js --mode production -o docs --output-filename index.js && cp index.html docs/

author: jmadotgg
